minecraft:emitter_initialization.creation_expression: variable.distance = math.sqrt((math.pow(variable.dir_x, 2) + math.pow(variable.dir_y, 2) + math.pow(variable.dir_z, 2)));variable.norm_x = (variable.dir_x / variable.distance);variable.norm_y = (variable.dir_y / variable.distance);variable.norm_z = (variable.dir_z / variable.distance);variable.off_x = 0;variable.off_y = 0;variable.off_z = 0;

minecraft:particle_initialization.per_update_expression: variable.time_percentage = Math.clamp(variable.particle_age / variable.particle_lifetime, 0, 1);variable.current_distance = variable.distance * variable.time_percentage;variable.off_x = (variable.norm_x * 0.5) + variable.norm_x * variable.current_distance;variable.off_y = (variable.norm_y * 0.5) + variable.norm_y * variable.current_distance;variable.off_z = (variable.norm_z * 0.5) + variable.norm_z * variable.current_distance;
